name: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 4: Nazotoki Collection
overview: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 4: Nazotoki Collection, is the fourth in a series of six compilation titles for the Game Boy Advance that contains emulated versions of Famicom games. It was released in 2005. Nazotoki roughly translates into the solution of a riddle, and this compilation focuses on puzzle type games, including: - Nuts & Milk - Binary Land - Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom
